name: Fight (itch)
description:
This is a single boss fight scene inspired by Nier Automata Opera Singer.

Controls:

WAD to Move and Rotate the Player

SPACE to Jump

Q to  Dash

LMB, RMB for Attacks

Objective - Defeat the Boss

Feedback and comments is highly appreciated. Hope you enjoy it. Full source available on Rud156 - Fight.
